/usr/bin/c++ -fPIC -g -shared -Wl,-soname,libeasy-vulkan.so -o lib/libeasy-vulkan.so CMakeFiles/easy-vulkan.dir/src/builder/ev_device_ci.cpp.o CMakeFiles/easy-vulkan.dir/src/builder/ev_instance_ci.cpp.o CMakeFiles/easy-vulkan.dir/src/builder/ev_queue_ci.cpp.o CMakeFiles/easy-vulkan.dir/src/ev_device.cpp.o CMakeFiles/easy-vulkan.dir/src/ev_instance.cpp.o CMakeFiles/easy-vulkan.dir/src/ev_utility.cpp.o   -L/usr/local/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib -lvulkan
